Name: Bahamas Daiquiri
Ingredients: 45 ml Jamaican-style overproof aged pot still rum
7.5 ml De Kuyper Crème de Cafe
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini (large 10oz) glass .
Review: Totally tropical with a sweet tangy edge.
History: Adapted from the Bahamas Martini created in 2002 by Yannick Miseriaux at the Fifth Floor Bar, Harvey Nichols, London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Bahamas Daiquiri contains 229 calories
